channel.title: Empire 06, Revelution of 2006
channel.description:
[center]Logo is coming soon...[/center] website: http://www.downgx.com I'm still in need of a web developer!
[u][b]Introduction[/b][/u]
Hey guys, I'm here to show a new rsps called "Empire 06". Empire 06 is going to be a stable ECO/PK server with allot of skills. By now most of you are probably thinking - "Another 06 Remake that is going to fail..."[/quote] NO, DownGradeX is NOT going to be a 06 Remake. We are just an RSPS with 06 Gameframe.
[u][b]Why I started this project...[/b][/u] Why did you decide to make you project? Simple, to learn new thing and give people a stable RSPS. I USED A CLEAN PI.
[code=Update Log] Post your updates here. I suggest making your update log have a layout. [/code] Example: [code=Update Log] Dwarfs222 - 2012/11/4 - Started project. 12/7: Worked on combat (50%) 12/8: finished combat (100%, like it was back then.) 12/9: worked on magic (10%) 12/11: worked on magic (75%) 12/12: Worked on prayer (10%) 12/13: Worked on prayer (75%) 12/15: Friend made me 75% mining 12/16: Finished firemaking! (100%) 12/17: woodcutting 80% (Have to deal with bugs) 12/18: 20% crafting 12/18: 20% cooking 12/19: 50% cooking 12/20: 40% crafting 12/21: 100% cooking! 12/21: 100% skill interfaces. PAUSED TILL 1/5/13 1/5: Added music to client 1/5: Added auto cache downloader
Check our website for more updates.
[/code] [code=Bugs List] I'm currently testing with my brother and irl friend. We already found some bugs: -Duel arena very buggy -Some woodcutting bugs [/code]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xfGXaEyh-7c [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/5ezl20.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/n48lya.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2aj9a81.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/vfjd3k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28tvuas.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/20f5klk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/dxbkte.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ddktag.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/11k8if4.png[/img]
If you have any questions, please head to our website or contact me on MoparScape!

item.title: Empire 06, Revelution of 2006
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[center]Logo is coming soon…[/center]
website: http://www.downgx.com
I’m still in need of a web developer!

Introduction

Hey guys,
I’m here to show a new rsps called “Empire 06”.
Empire 06 is going to be a stable ECO/PK server with allot of skills.
By now most of you are probably thinking - “Another 06 Remake that is going to fail…”[/quote]
NO, DownGradeX is NOT going to be a 06 Remake.
We are just an RSPS with 06 Gameframe.

Why I started this project…
Why did you decide to make you project? Simple, to learn new thing and give people a stable RSPS.
I USED A CLEAN PI.

Post your updates here. I suggest making your update log have a layout.

Example:

Dwarfs222 - 2012/11/4 - Started project.
12/7: Worked on combat (50%)
12/8: finished combat (100%, like it was back then.)
12/9: worked on magic (10%)
12/11: worked on magic (75%)
12/12: Worked on prayer (10%)
12/13: Worked on prayer (75%) 
12/15: Friend made me 75% mining
12/16: Finished firemaking! (100%)
12/17: woodcutting 80% (Have to deal with bugs)
12/18: 20% crafting
12/18: 20% cooking
12/19: 50% cooking
12/20: 40% crafting
12/21: 100% cooking! 
12/21: 100% skill interfaces.
PAUSED TILL 1/5/13
1/5: Added music to client 
1/5: Added auto cache downloader

Check our website for more updates.

I'm currently testing with my brother and irl friend. 
We already found some bugs: 
-Duel arena very buggy
-Some woodcutting bugs










If you have any questions, please head to our website or contact me on MoparScape!

Read full topic
